title: The GPU shortage sucks - these are the best gaming laptop Prime Day deals you can still get
author: matt-hanson
summary: Sick of trying to get an RTX 3080? Get a gaming laptop instead
article: It's been a rough year for upgrading your gaming PC, thanks to the extreme graphics card shortage, so the last thing you're going to find right now is a Prime Day deal on a GPU or, really, a desktop gaming PC.

Well to heck with all that, we say. For the price of a high-end graphics card right now – or even less – you can get some amazing Prime Day laptop deals on some high-end gaming laptops featuring RTX 2070, RTX 2080, and even the latest RTX 3070 and RTX 3080 GPUs.

What's more, it's actually possible to buy these laptops, which you really can't say for high-end graphics cards right now. So if you have your heart set on playing the latest AAA games on some heavy-duty hardware, you should definitely give some of the best gaming laptops a good, hard look.

Prime Day 2021 might now be over, but that's not a problem for gaming laptop deal hunters. Many of the best gaming laptop deals on Prime Day weren't even at Amazon, and they're still rolling along. So here's what you can still get your hands on.
Not in the US or UK? Scroll down for gaming laptop deals in your region.
If you're outside the US or the UK, no worries, there are still plenty of great gaming laptop deals for you. Here you'll find the best on offer right now that are available in your region.
